data.eml:eml: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Marin-Felix, Yasmina, Guarro, Josep, ano-Lira, Jose F., Garcia, Dania, iller, Andrew N., Stchigel, Alberto M. (2018): Melanospora (Sordariomycetes, Ascomycota) and its relatives. MycoKeys 44: 81-122, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.44.29742, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.44.29742
